snippet: Tom Brady is ready to play after cutting his right thumb with scissors in a "silly accident" before the Patriots' preseason game against the Bears last week....
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady is ready to play after cutting his right thumb with scissors in a "silly accident" before the Patriots' preseason game against the Bears last week.

headline.main: Brady Ready After 'Silly Accident' With Scissors Cuts Thumb
headline.print_headline: Brady Ready After 'Silly Accident' With Scissors Cuts Thumb
